extensionDescription.message: Easily hide job listings on LinkedIn based on companies or status.

appDescription.message: Easily hide job listings on LinkedIn based on companies or status.

textareaPlaceholder.message: Enter company names, one per line.

donateText.message: Support My Work - Buy Me a Coffee!

errorSaving.message: Error saving data. Please try again.

errorAddingCompany.message: Could not add company. Try again later.

popupInstructions.message: Manage your block list below. Enter one company per line and click Save.

clearConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to clear all blocked companies?

quickFilterAppliedTooltip.message: Hide jobs that you’ve already applied to.

quickFilterPromotedTooltip.message: Hide promoted job listings. Please note this might result in empty results.

quickFilterDismissedTooltip.message: Hide jobs that you have dismissed.

quickFilterViewedTooltip.message: Hide jobs that you’ve already viewed.

showButtonTooltip.message: Show/Hide an icon on LinkedIn jobs posting to easily hide a company.
